text.section: This section does not apply to those units of State government with an independent personnel system.

The Secretary shall:
assign a class to the skilled service, professional service, management service, or executive service, as appropriate; and
designate special appointment positions in the State Personnel Management System that:
must be filled without regard to political affiliation, belief, or opinion; or
in accordance with § 6-405(b) of this article, may be filled with regard to political affiliation, belief, or opinion.
